::: {.project-intro}
A collection of stunning residential properties in Marin County, showcasing the region's distinctive architecture and design aesthetic. These homes exemplify California living at its finest, with an emphasis on indoor-outdoor flow, natural materials, and breathtaking views. The photography captures both the architectural details and the lifestyle these spaces inspire.
:::

::: {.masonry-grid}
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

# Auto-generate masonry grid from folder
image_files <- list.files("../images/projects/marin-homes", full.names = TRUE, pattern = "\\.(jpg|jpeg|png|webp|gif)$")

for (img in image_files) {
  # Extract filename without extension for alt text
  filename <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(img))
  alt_text <- paste("Marin County home photography by Cristina Carrizosa -", filename)
  cat(sprintf('![%s](%s){.gallery-img loading="lazy" group="marin-homes-gallery"}\n\n', alt_text, img))
}
```
:::
